basicDesc: The Health score represents how much HP your character has. It is related to a number of skills.
name: HEA

basicDesc: The Magicka score represents how much "Mana" or MP your character has. It is related to a number of skills.
name: MAG

basicDesc: The Stamina score represents how much Stamina your character has. It is related to a number of skills.
name: STA
